text: The canton of Pays de Serres Sud-Quercy is an administrative division of the Tarn-et-Garonne department, in southern France. It was created at the French canton reorganisation which came into effect in March 2015. Its seat is in Lafrançaise.Décret n° 2014-273 du 27 février 2014 portant délimitation des cantons dans le département de Tarn-et-Garonne It consists of the following communes: #Belvèze #Bouloc-en-Quercy #Cazes-Mondenard #Durfort-Lacapelette #Fauroux #Labarthe #Lacour #Lafrançaise #Lauzerte #Miramont-de-Quercy #Montagudet #Montaigu-de-Quercy #Montbarla #Puycornet #Roquecor #Saint-Amans- de-Pellagal #Saint-Amans-du-Pech #Saint-Beauzeil #Sainte-Juliette #Sauveterre #Touffailles #Tréjouls #Valeilles #Vazerac ==References== Category:Cantons of Tarn-et-Garonne
title: Canton of Pays de Serres Sud-Quercy
